tool_description: Key Shadowing technology offers a radical breakthrough in data security by eliminating the need to store a cryptographic master key, which is vulnerable to today’s computers and social engineering. With Key Shadowing, master keys are never persistently stored and therefore cannot be hacked or stolen resulting in a “keyless” system. The technology not only protects against attacks based on quantum computing, it also provides unique benefits by securing payment systems, enhancing enterprise key...
name: Key Shadowing
title: Key Shadowing

api_list.name: New

required_parameters.name: keysrequired
required_parameters.description: The number of KeyShadows required to regenerate the MasterKey, either 2, 3 or 4

required_parameters.name: keylength
required_parameters.description: The length in bits of the MasterKey must be greater than 64 and less than 1024 and a multiple of 8

optional_parameters.name: numkeys
optional_parameters.description: The number of KeyShadows to be generated, must be less than 100
